data.title: Sacred Heart Girls’ College Hamilton
data.meta_description: Many thanks to Brooke Goodwin and Caitlen Parry, ex Sacred Heart students, for providing Emily Penrose with such a well organised and comprehensive experience at Marian Catholic School.
data.text:
Many thanks to Brooke Goodwin and Caitlen Parry, ex Sacred Heart students, for providing Emily Penrose with such a well organised and comprehensive experience at Marian Catholic School.

Emily thoroughly enjoyed her time in both classrooms and gained an insight into different teaching styles and classroom management. She was involved in Sport, Jump Jam, testing, taking reading groups, writing and math.

“Ka mahi tahi matou, kia ohoka te pitomata hai puanani” / “We will work together in order to wake potential to freely travel in any chosen direction”
